title: Ex of accused murderer of KKK wizard says she'spure evil‘ | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad EXCLUSIVE: 'Malissa is throwing my son under the bus to save her own skin.' Former husband and father of accused murderers of Ku Klux Klan ‘imperial wizard’ says his ex is a ‘pure evil’ racist who was cheating on Frank Ancona Paul Jinkerson, 48, the ex-husband of accused killer Malissa Ann Ancona and father of her son tells DailyMail.com she willingly embraced her slain husband's vile white supremacist ideology Jinkerson, who has the same name as his son who also stands accused, blames her for the February 17 murder 'She was lazy, she was uneducated, she was a sociopath. My mother used to say she was pure evil,' said the elder Jinkerson Frank Ancona was the 'imperial wizard' of a St. Louis Ku Klux Klan chapter Malissa Ancona had posted on Facebook that she was looking for a roommate - the same day he went missing 'My son would tell me they were going out of town for rallies and gatherings. I know she sewed all their robes and hoods,' says Jinkserson 'There's a line from the Elton John song Tiny Dancer that refers to the 'seamstress for the band.' We used to call her the seamstress for the Klan' Published: 18:16 GMT, 16 February 2017 | Updated: 18:16 GMT, 16 February 2017 523 shares
